intro.html:
Transforming Businesses with AI-Powered Data Solutions

We create AI-powered applications to help large enterprises use their data more effectively.

Our apps are designed to be scalable, allow external access, and support custom branding.

node.title: External Access and OAuth
node.description: Run independently of your Data Warehouse, allowing external users to access your app. It even supports OAuth.

node.title: Custom Company Branding
node.description: Use your company's branding in your apps and bring them to any device, including mobile and tablets.

node.title: Scalability
node.description: Deploy your apps outside of your Data Warehouse to comfortably support thousands of users.
